name: BobCAD-CAM Document
summary: A BBCDX file is a CAD design created by BobCAD-CAM, a CAD and CAM application for Windows. It stores a manufacturing part design and its information, similar to a .BBCD file, but BobCAD-CAM users save designs in the BBCDX format to transfer them between BobCAD-CAM and the Dassault Systemes SolidWorks and Rhino apps using the BobCAM plugins .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Dassault Systemes SolidWorks with BobCAM plugin
